Question
========

Sixty percent of the Dutch people regularly spread peanut butter on bread. Suppose 80% of them die before the age of 75. death. Among non-peanut butter users, only 40% do. How big is then the probability that someone who dies before age 75^e^ is **not** peanut butter user?

Answerlist
----------

* 0.25
* 0.32
* 0.60

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.25: Correct
* 0.32: Incorrect
* 0.60: Incorrect
